name: Avalon - Reserve Series
description: Visit Meritage Homes' Conyers, GA new home community Avalon - Reserve Series in Atlanta, GA. Live in an energy-efficient home in Salem High School School District. Move-in ready homes available.

homesites.name: 2050 Avalon Ridge Rockdale, GA
homesites.overview: Prep dinner at the kitchen island while catching up with family in the open-concept living area. Upstairs, the loft makes an ideal play or media room. Across the hall, a spacious walk-in closet and dual-sink ensuite bath complement the primary suite.

homesites.name: 2032 Avalon Ridge Conyers, GA
homesites.overview: Prep dinner at the kitchen island while catching up with family in the open-concept living area. Upstairs, the loft makes an ideal play or media room. Across the hall, a spacious walk-in closet and dual-sink ensuite bath complement the primary suite.

homesites.name: 2034 Avalon Ridge Conyers, GA
homesites.overview: Kick your feet up after a long day on the back patio. Inside, the kitchen island overlooks the open-concept great room. Upstairs, the kids will love the loft and study nook. The primary suite features a spacious ensuite bath and walk-in closet.

homesites.name: 2024 Avalon Ridge Conyers, GA
homesites.overview: Kick your feet up after a long day on the back patio. Inside, the kitchen island overlooks the open-concept great room. Upstairs, the kids will love the loft and study nook. The primary suite features a spacious ensuite bath and walk-in closet.

homesites.name: 2026 Avalon Ridge Conyers, GA
homesites.overview: Unwind at the end of the day in the private first-floor primary suite, complete with dual sinks and an impressive walk-in closet. In the kitchen, a sizeable island anchors the open-concept living space. Upstairs, the loft makes a great media room.

homesites.name: 2038 Avalon Ridge Conyers, GA
homesites.overview: Cheer on your favorite team on the big screen in the second-story loft. Down the hall, the primary suite boasts dual sinks, a spacious shower, and walk-in closet. On the main floor, a guest bed and bath will make visitors feel right at home.

homesites.name: 2028 Avalon Ridge Conyers, GA
homesites.overview: Cheer on your favorite team on the big screen in the second-story loft. Down the hall, the primary suite boasts dual sinks, a spacious shower, and walk-in closet. On the main floor, a guest bed and bath will make visitors feel right at home.

homesites.name: 2052 Avalon Ridge Rockdale, GA
homesites.overview: Host the next holiday gathering in the open-concept kitchen and living area. With five bedrooms, there’s plenty of room to spread out. Personalize the second-story loft to meet your needs. Dual sinks and a large closet complement the primary suite.

homesites.name: 2030 Avalon Ridge Rockdale, GA
homesites.overview: Host the next holiday gathering in the open-concept kitchen and living area. With five bedrooms, there’s plenty of room to spread out. Personalize the second-story loft to meet your needs. Dual sinks and a large closet complement the primary suite.
